title: QuickPwn_1.0.0.tbz
description:
Here is the long awaited "QuickPwn" for Mac OS X. You will see a similarity to the user-interface of PwnageTool, this is because of the great feedback we have had since we moved to that interface with PwnageTool 2.x. 

QuickPwn is not a replacement for PwnageTool, they are different tools and provide different features, QuickPwn is for quickly pwning a device, whereas PwnageTool is designed to custom build and tailor the ipsw production process, both tools will be actively developed in the future.

To use QuickPwn 1.0 Mac OS X your device should be running 2.0.2, if it is not then you can upgrade it to 2.0.2 using iTunes and then use the QuickPwn tool, we repeat, it will only work on version 2.0.2 of the iPhone or iPod touch firmware. 

If you donÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t want specific things to happen such as baseband updates then PwnageTool should be used to create a custom .ipsw with your specifics.
